name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Digital Arrow Tax Extension for Chrome

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Digital Arrow Tax Extension for Egyptian eInvoice Signing the invoices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Digital Arrow is a leading provider of tax compliance solutions for businesses in Egypt. We offer a seamless and secure way to sign your e-invoices using our cloud-based platform. With Digital Arrow, you can easily generate, validate, and submit your e-invoices to the Egyptian Tax Authority (ETA) in compliance with the new e-invoicing regulations.
